definition[0]: a customer who wants to buy high quality equipment, which has the same features as the equipment used by professionals
example[0]: DVD Workshop Express is aimed at prosumers who want to create professional-looking DVD productions.
definition[1]: a customer who knows a lot about a particular type of product, who is used by a company to help design and develop its products
example[1]: Prosumers are far more likely than ordinary consumers to be consulted for their opinions on companies and brands.
